description.zh-cn: 香港企业家及社会运动人士，佐丹奴、壹传媒、苹果日报的创办人。因其鲜明的政治立场及积极参与社会运动而成为备受争议的人物，目前因多宗案件被香港政府监禁。
description.en: A Hong Kong entrepreneur and social activist, founder of Giordano, Next Digital, and Apple Daily. He is a controversial figure due to his strong political stance and active involvement in social movements, and is currently imprisoned by the Hong Kong government for multiple cases.

description.zh-cn: 由黎智英创办的香港传媒集团，旗下曾拥有《苹果日报》和《壹周刊》等刊物。
description.en: A Hong Kong media group founded by Jimmy Lai, which once owned publications such as Apple Daily and Next Magazine.

description.zh-cn: 由黎智英创办的服装零售品牌。
description.en: A clothing retail brand founded by Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 由黎智英于1995年创办的香港报纸，以亲民主派立场和调查性报导闻名，已于2021年停刊。
description.en: A Hong Kong newspaper founded by Jimmy Lai in 1995, known for its pro-democracy stance and investigative reporting. It ceased publication in 2021.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任美国众议院议长。
description.en: American politician who served as Speaker of the United States House of Representatives.

description.zh-cn: 香港传媒人，曾多次接替黎智英担任壹传媒董事会主席。
description.en: Hong Kong media professional who has succeeded Jimmy Lai as the chairman of Next Digital on multiple occasions.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英的第二任妻子。
description.en: The second wife of Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英的次子。
description.en: The second son of Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英的三子。
description.en: The third son of Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 香港新闻主播，黎智英次子黎耀恩的妻子。
description.en: Hong Kong news anchor, wife of Jimmy Lai's second son, Lai Yiu-yan.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法
en: Law of the People's Republic of China on Safeguarding National Security in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 由全国人民代表大会制定的关于香港国家安全的法律，黎智英是其中一名因违反该法而被捕和起诉的知名人士。
description.en: A law concerning national security in Hong Kong enacted by the National People's Congress. Jimmy Lai is a prominent figure arrested and prosecuted for violating this law.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报，曾发文称黎智英为“祸港四人帮”之首。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, which published an article calling Jimmy Lai the head of the 'Gang of Four who bring disaster to Hong Kong'.

en: Gang of Four who bring disaster to Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 中国官方媒体用于批评四位香港民主派人士的称呼，黎智英被指为其中之首。
description.en: A term used by Chinese state media to criticize four Hong Kong pro-democracy figures, with Jimmy Lai identified as its leader.

nodes.id: 反对修订逃犯条例运动

zh-cn: 反对修订逃犯条例运动

description.zh-cn: 2019年在香港发生的大规模社会运动，黎智英是该运动的积极参与者和支持者，并因此面临多项指控。
description.en: A large-scale social movement in Hong Kong in 2019. Jimmy Lai was an active participant and supporter of the movement, and consequently faced multiple charges.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京的政治事件，对黎智英的个人与事业影响深远，促使他创办《壹周刊》和《苹果日报》。
description.en: A political event that occurred in Beijing in 1989, which had a profound impact on Jimmy Lai's personal life and career, prompting him to found Next Magazine and Apple Daily.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国国务院总理，被认为是六四事件的主要决策者之一。黎智英曾发表公开信严厉批评他。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, considered one of the key decision-makers in the Tiananmen Square protests. Jimmy Lai published an open letter sharply criticizing him.

description.zh-cn: 自1949年起统治中国大陆的政权。黎智英因其政治立场而与该政府关系紧张，并最终被其下辖的香港政府拘捕。
description.en: The regime governing mainland China since 1949. Jimmy Lai has had a tense relationship with this government due to his political stance and was eventually arrested by the Hong Kong government under its jurisdiction.

description.zh-cn: 2014年在香港发生的一场争取真普选的公民抗命运动，黎智英是参与者之一。
description.en: A civil disobedience movement for universal suffrage in Hong Kong in 2014, in which Jimmy Lai was a participant.

en: Occupy Central with Love and Peace

description.zh-cn: 一场在香港发起的争取普选的公民不服从运动，黎智英是该运动的参与者和支持者。
description.en: A civil disobedience movement advocating for universal suffrage in Hong Kong. Jimmy Lai was a participant and supporter of the movement.

description.zh-cn: 香港的主要民主派政党之一，曾接受黎智英的政治捐款。
description.en: One of Hong Kong's major pro-democracy political parties, which has received political donations from Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 香港的民主派政党，曾接受黎智英的政治捐款。
description.en: A pro-democracy political party in Hong Kong that has received political donations from Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 香港的激进民主派政党，曾接受黎智英的政治捐款。
description.en: A radical pro-democracy political party in Hong Kong that has received political donations from Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 天主教香港教区荣休主教，曾接受黎智英的捐款用于教会工作。
description.en: Bishop Emeritus of the Catholic Diocese of Hong Kong, who received donations from Jimmy Lai for church work.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾与黎智英会面讨论占领中环运动的策略。
description.en: Taiwanese politician who met with Jimmy Lai to discuss strategies for the Occupy Central movement.

description.zh-cn: 现任中共中央总书记和中国国家主席，黎智英曾公开批评他为“独裁者”。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of China, whom Jimmy Lai publicly criticized as a 'dictator'.

description.zh-cn: 美国前副国防部长，曾与黎智英在香港会面。
description.en: Former U.S. Deputy Secretary of Defense who met with Jimmy Lai in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英的私人助理，被指曾任职于美国情报机构。
description.en: Jimmy Lai's personal assistant, alleged to have previously worked for U.S. intelligence agencies.

description.zh-cn: 美国前副总统，曾于2019年在白宫与黎智英会面。
description.en: Former Vice President of the United States who met with Jimmy Lai at the White House in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 美国前国务卿，曾于2019年与黎智英会面讨论香港局势。
description.en: Former U.S. Secretary of State who met with Jimmy Lai in 2019 to discuss the situation in Hong Kong.

nodes.id: 香港警务处国家安全处

zh-cn: 香港警务处国家安全处
en: National Security Department of the Hong Kong Police Force

description.zh-cn: 香港警务处下属负责维护国家安全的部门，曾多次拘捕黎智英。
description.en: A department of the Hong Kong Police Force responsible for national security, which has arrested Jimmy Lai on multiple occasions.

description.zh-cn: 香港现任行政长官，曾任保安局局长，期间引用国安法冻结黎智英的财产。
description.en: Current Chief Executive of Hong Kong, who previously served as Secretary for Security and froze Jimmy Lai's assets under the National Security Law.

nodes.id: 「煞停警黑乱港 落实五大诉求」集会

zh-cn: 「煞停警黑乱港 落实五大诉求」集会

description.zh-cn: 2019年8月18日在香港维多利亚公园举行的集会，黎智英因参与此未经批准的集结而被判刑。
description.en: A rally held at Victoria Park in Hong Kong on August 18, 2019. Jimmy Lai was sentenced for participating in this unauthorized assembly.

description.zh-cn: 2019年10月1日在中国国庆日期间香港发生的游行示威活动，黎智英因参与此未经批准的集结而被判刑。
description.en: Protests and demonstrations that took place in Hong Kong on China's National Day, October 1, 2019. Jimmy Lai was sentenced for participating in this unauthorized assembly.

description.zh-cn: 每年在香港维多利亚公园举行的纪念六四事件的烛光晚会。黎智英因参与2020年未经批准的集会而被判刑。
description.en: An annual candlelight vigil held in Victoria Park, Hong Kong, to commemorate the Tiananmen Square protests. Jimmy Lai was sentenced for participating in the unauthorized 2020 assembly.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关的常设机关。其对《港区国安法》的解释阻止了黎智英聘用英国御用大律师为其国安法案件辩护。
description.en: The permanent body of the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China. Its interpretation of the Hong Kong National Security Law prevented Jimmy Lai from hiring a British King's Counsel to defend him in his national security case.

description.zh-cn: 英国御用大律师。黎智英曾尝试聘请他为其国安法案件辩护，但因港府提请人大释法而受阻。
description.en: A British King's Counsel whom Jimmy Lai attempted to hire for his national security case, but was blocked after the Hong Kong government requested an interpretation from the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 壹传媒集团行政总监，与黎智英一同因欺诈罪被定罪。
description.en: Administrative director of Next Digital, convicted of fraud alongside Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 香港民主党创党主席，与黎智英关系密切，并一同参与民主运动。
description.en: Founding chairman of the Democratic Party in Hong Kong, closely associated with Jimmy Lai and a fellow participant in the pro-democracy movement.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家。黎智英于1996年获得英国国籍。
description.en: A European country. Jimmy Lai acquired British citizenship in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英出生时的国家，他拥有该国国籍和居留证。
description.en: The country of Jimmy Lai's birth; he holds its nationality and residency permit.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英于1990年创办壹传媒集团。
description.en: Jimmy Lai founded the Next Media group in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英曾两度担任壹传媒董事会主席。
description.en: Jimmy Lai served as the Chairman of the Board of Next Digital on two separate occasions.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英是佐丹奴的创办人。
description.en: Jimmy Lai is the founder of Giordano.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英于1995年创办《苹果日报》。
description.en: Jimmy Lai founded Apple Daily in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英于1947年12月8日出生于中华民国广州市。
description.en: Jimmy Lai was born on December 8, 1947, in Guangzhou, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李韵琴是黎智英的第二任妻子。
description.en: Li Wan-kam is the second wife of Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 黎见恩是黎智英的长子。
description.en: Lai Kin-yan is the eldest son of Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 黎耀恩是黎智英的次子。
description.en: Lai Yiu-yan is the second son of Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 黎崇恩是黎智英的三子。
description.en: Lai Chung-yan is the third son of Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 曾美华于2011年5月2日与黎智英次子黎耀恩结婚。
description.en: Tsang Mei-wah married Jimmy Lai's second son, Lai Yiu-yan, on May 2, 2011.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

description.zh-cn: 香港警方依据《港区国安法》以“勾结外国或者境外势力危害国家安全罪”等罪名拘捕黎智英。
description.en: The Hong Kong police arrested Jimmy Lai under the National Security Law on charges including 'collusion with a foreign country or with external elements to endanger national security'.

description.zh-cn: 中国官媒《人民日报》将黎智英称为“祸港四人帮”之首，对其进行严厉批评。
description.en: Chinese state media People's Daily labeled Jimmy Lai as the head of the 'Gang of Four who bring disaster to Hong Kong', severely criticizing him.

description.zh-cn: 被《人民日报》称为“祸港四人帮”之首。
description.en: Was labeled the head of the 'Gang of Four who bring disaster to Hong Kong' by People's Daily.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件对黎智英的个人与事业影响深远，促使他创办了持反共立场的《壹周刊》和《苹果日报》。
description.en: The Tiananmen Square protests had a profound impact on Jimmy Lai's personal life and career, prompting him to establish the anti-communist publications Next Magazine and Apple Daily.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英于1994年7月在《壹周刊》刊登《给王八蛋李鹏的公开信》，严厉批评时任中国总理李鹏。
description.en: In July 1994, Jimmy Lai published 'An Open Letter to the Bastard Li Peng' in Next Magazine, sharply criticizing then-Chinese Premier Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 在黎智英批评李鹏后，北京政府封杀了佐丹奴在中国内地的业务，迫使黎智英出售其股份。
description.en: After Jimmy Lai criticized Li Peng, the Beijing government shut down Giordano's business in mainland China, forcing Lai to sell his shares.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英公开批评中共中央总书记习近平是“毛泽东的化身”及“人类有史以来最极端的独裁者”。
description.en: Jimmy Lai publicly criticized CPC General Secretary Xi Jinping as 'the reincarnation of Mao Zedong' and 'the most extreme dictator in human history'.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英在2006至2010年间向香港民主党捐款超过1000万港元。
description.en: Jimmy Lai donated over HK$10 million to the Democratic Party in Hong Kong between 2006 and 2010.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英在2006至2010年间向香港公民党捐款超过1000万港元。
description.en: Jimmy Lai donated over HK$10 million to the Civic Party in Hong Kong between 2006 and 2010.

description.zh-cn: 在2010年“五区公投”期间，黎智英向社民连捐款100万港元。
description.en: During the 'Five Constituencies Referendum' in 2010, Jimmy Lai donated HK$1 million to the League of Social Democrats.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英曾向天主教香港教区荣休主教陈日君捐款2000万港元以推行教会工作。
description.en: Jimmy Lai donated HK$20 million to Joseph Zen, Bishop Emeritus of the Catholic Diocese of Hong Kong, to support church work.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英曾与台湾前倒扁红衫军总指挥施明德秘密开会，讨论如何执行占领中环运动。
description.en: Jimmy Lai held a secret meeting with former Taiwanese anti-government protest leader Shih Ming-teh to discuss how to execute the Occupy Central movement.

description.zh-cn: 2014年5月底，黎智英在香港与美国前副防长保罗·沃尔福威茨会面。
description.en: In late May 2014, Jimmy Lai met with former U.S. Deputy Secretary of Defense Paul Wolfowitz in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 马克·西蒙是黎智英的私人助理。
description.en: Mark Simon is the personal assistant to Jimmy Lai.

description.zh-cn: 2019年7月8日，黎智英在美国白宫与时任副总统迈克·彭斯会面，讨论香港情况。
description.en: On July 8, 2019, Jimmy Lai met with then-Vice President Mike Pence at the White House to discuss the situation in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 2019年7月，黎智英与时任美国国务卿迈克·蓬佩奥会面，讨论香港修订逃犯条例的发展。
description.en: In July 2019, Jimmy Lai met with then-U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo to discuss the developments of the proposed extradition bill in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 2019年10月，黎智英在美国国会大厦与时任众议院议长南希·佩洛西会面。
description.en: In October 2019, Jimmy Lai met with then-Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi at the U.S. Capitol.

relationships.source: 香港警务处国家安全处

description.zh-cn: 2020年8月10日，香港警务处国家安全处以涉嫌违反《港区国安法》为由拘捕黎智英。
description.en: On August 10, 2020, the National Security Department of the Hong Kong Police Force arrested Jimmy Lai on suspicion of violating the National Security Law.

description.zh-cn: 时任香港保安局局长的李家超首次引用国安法冻结资产的权力，冻结了黎智英持有的公司股份及银行账户财产。
description.en: Then-Secretary for Security John Lee invoked the power under the National Security Law for the first time to freeze assets, targeting Jimmy Lai's company shares and bank account properties.

relationships.source: 「煞停警黑乱港 落实五大诉求」集会

description.zh-cn: 黎智英因组织及参与2019年8月18日的未经批准集会，被判监禁9个月。
description.en: Jimmy Lai was sentenced to 9 months in prison for organizing and participating in an unauthorized assembly on August 18, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英因参与2019年10月1日的未经批准游行，被判监禁14个月。
description.en: Jimmy Lai was sentenced to 14 months in prison for participating in an unauthorized procession on October 1, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英因参与2020年未经批准的六四集会，被判监禁13个月。
description.en: Jimmy Lai was sentenced to 13 months in prison for participating in the unauthorized June 4th assembly in 2020.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 全国人大常委会对《港区国安法》作出解释，事实上阻止了英国御用大律师Tim Owen代表黎智英出庭抗辩。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the National People's Congress issued an interpretation of the National Security Law, which effectively blocked British King's Counsel Tim Owen from representing Jimmy Lai in court.

description.zh-cn: 黄伟强是壹传媒集团的行政总监，向黎智英汇报。两人一同在欺诈案中被定罪。
description.en: Wong Wai-keung was the Administrative Director of Next Media Group, reporting to Jimmy Lai. Both were convicted in the fraud case.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英于1996年取得英国国籍。
description.en: Jimmy Lai acquired British citizenship in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英出生时即为中华民国国民，后亦持有中华民国居留证。
description.en: Jimmy Lai has been a national of the Republic of China since birth and later also held a ROC residency permit.

description.zh-cn: 黎智英于1960年移居香港，具有中华人民共和国公民身份。香港及中国政府主张其中国公民身份，不承认其英国国籍带来的领事保护权。
description.en: Jimmy Lai moved to Hong Kong in 1960, holding the status of a citizen of the People's Republic of China. The Hong Kong and Chinese governments assert his Chinese citizenship and do not recognize consular protection rights from his British nationality.
